verses.verse: Thus said <WH559> Yahweh, <WH3068> Go, <WH1980> and buy <WH7069> a potter <WH3335>'s earthen <WH2789> bottle, <WH1228> and take some of the elders <WH2205> of the people, <WH5971> and of the elders <WH2205> of the priests; <WH3548>
